Sector.Name: Precipice
Sector.Credits:
Precipice Subsector from Disappearance on Aramat, Grenadier Models, 1984

Pesek Subsector and Cyris, John M. Ford, "Geria Transfer", Journal of the Travellers Aid Society, issue 10.

Sturray, Marcus L. Rowland, "The Thing In the Depths", Journal of the Travellers Aid Society, issue 22.

Dartho Subsector and Koa, Phil Masters, "Lone Dragon", White Dwarf, issue 68.

Shangrila, Andy Slack, "The Snowbird Mystery", White Dwarf, issue 41.

Syleria, Simon Lewis, "Mercy Mission", White Dwarf, issue 82.

Other worlds by Marcus L. Rowland, William H. Keith, Jeff May, Ian Delaney, Frank Chadwick, Anders Blixt, Tim Brown, Marc W. Miller, John Harshman, based on Supplement 6: 76 Patrons and Journal of the Travellers Aid Society, published by Game Designers Workshop.

Data transcribed and edited by Joshua Bell and Graham Donald.
